attributes.action: Remove the speed limits on all motorways with 3 or more lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics from Germany clearly show that on safe roads such as motorways speeding does not cause any more accidents. A higher speed limit would help alleviate congestion. Today's speed limits are based on the capabilties of cars from 30 years ago and they need updating.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/85-mph/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
